de.saschafeldmann.adesso.master.thesis.generation.specifications

Interface TestQuestionSpecification<T extends Concept>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CardinalRelationConceptTestQuestionSpec, FillInTheBlankConceptTestQuestionSpec

    public interface TestQuestionSpecification<T extends Concept>
    Project: Masterthesis of Sascha Feldmann Creation date: 04.07.2016 Author: Sascha Feldmann (sascha.feldmann@gmx.de)

    University: Hochschule f√ºr Technik und Wirtschaft, Berlin Fachbereich 4 Studiengang Internationale Medieninformatik (Master)

    Company: adesso AG

    Following the natural language generation approach inntroduced by [Reiter], this is the interface for the second step within the NLG pipeline - the microplanning which produces a text specification.
    In my case, the text specification specifies how to exactly create the final test question linguistically for the related Concept.
    This means, each concept has its own implementation of TestQuestionSpecification. See: Reiter, E., Dale, R., & Feng, Z. (2000). Building natural language generation systems (Vol. 33). Cambridge: Cambridge university press.

      java.lang.String buildSpec()
      Builds the specification for the concept returned by getUnderlyingConcept().

      Gets the underlying concepts for this test question specification.
